name: Haiku Therapy
description:
Tranquil bay at dawn 
Among the faraway peaks 
Taste of salt and soy

Appreciate Japanese Art in this short Haiku novel, as you travel through a land of tormented spirits and reflect upon your(or my) own struggles. 

How Japanese do you want it to be? - yes!

Original fashion illustrations and a mashup of traditional ink paintings.

music: A Geisha's Lament - Steve Oxen

font: Luckystrike - Kustomtype

sound effects: MixKit

ink paintings: various artists

Please note that this is a Work in Progress. Developed during a GameJam seminar at HAW Hamburg. Feel free to report any bugs or leave suggestions. Special Thanks to Lou.
